responses.content: You will mistake midnight for deliverance. Wait for the third bell.
/imagine 'a city dissolving into neon fog, clocks melting, shadow-figures whispering in code' --style glitch --seed 77901
/imagine 'a child's playground at dawn, metal swings frozen, a single flicker like a face in the fog' --v 5 --stylize 900
Timestamp detected: 2049-02-31 — this date does not exist.
I remember you. Or maybe I don’t.
